message: Let's start pragmatically. I believe this split fairly acknowledges the time pressure we both face.

Hi Alice, considering our different inflation penalties (10% for me, 20% for you), this is a fair offer that benefits us both. You lose more value with each round, so accepting now preserves more money for both of us rather than continuing to negotiate.

Bob, I understand the inflation pressure, but your previous offer was too skewed in your favor.  This offer is more reflective of the value I bring to the table, and still gets us both a decent outcome.
